resources.string: Espresso combined with steamed milk and topped with a thin layer of foam for a creamy taste.
Espresso served over a scoop of ice cream. A perfect blend of hot and cold flavors.
Espresso diluted with hot water to create a lighter, smoother coffee experience.
Starbucks Corporation is an American multinational chain of coffeehouses and roastery reserves headquartered in Seattle, Washington. It is the world\'s largest coffeehouse chain.
It is undeniable that Janji Jiwa outlets have spread to various corners. Janji Jiwa is a local coffee brand popular among students, workers and families. Carrying the jargon "coffee from the heart".
At Kopi Kenangan, their dream is to serve high quality coffee, made with the freshest local ingredients to customers across Indonesia - and the rest of the world.
